author:
Bill Kiser 
Correspondent
title: Mallard Creek topples AL Brown 37-27
text: October 23, 2015 Mallard Creek topples AL Brown 37-27 Mallard Creek Mavericks wide receiver Ryan Jones, left, catches a touchdown pass as A.L. Brown cornerback Shymere Scott, right, applies pressure during second quarter action on Friday, October 23, 2015 at Mallard Creek High School. Jeff Siner jsiner@charlotteobserver.com Mallard Creek Mavericks running back Chancery Bowman, center, continues to fight for yardage as A.L. Brown's Brandon Dry, left, and Steven Howie, right, look to make the tackle during first quarter action on Friday, October 23, 2015 at Mallard Creek High School.
